interpretation: The "supervillain" card, represented by the ðŸ¦¹ emoji, suggests a looming threat or a powerful adversary that is working against you. This card is a warning to be cautious of the people and situations around you, as there may be hidden dangers or ulterior motives at play. It's important to stay vigilant and trust your instincts, as this card can indicate deception and manipulation. On the flip side, this card can also represent your own inner demons and negative thought patterns that may be holding you back from achieving your goals. It's time to confront these issues head-on and take control of your own destiny. Keywords associated with this card include danger, caution, deceit, manipulation, power struggle, and self-sabotage. When this card appears in a reading, it's important to consider the context and other cards in the spread to gain a deeper understanding of its message.
